title: What is it going to take to change this HORRENDOUS state of the game?!?
body: This shit is more dull than Prehistoric cave man's knife. You can't even kill anyone anymore before 15 minutes unless they completely fuck up. You have to basically kill someone 3 times with this fucking stopwatch inbetween flash and barrier cooldowns. This game is absolutely PATHETIC. There's literally no reason to play ANYTHING but tanks and ADC. There's no outplays anymore unless it comes on a fucking stopwatch usage, when are you @Riot going to admit you FUCKED UP AND REMOVE FUCKING STOPWATCH?!?!

replies.body: Always love it to see when someone feeds his ass off in ranked and then comes to the boards to complain lol

Someone who has less damage than the support as a Zed tries to tell me that I suck at the game for playing support, alright man :D It's completly okay that you are hardstuck and had your main account permabanned which is why you are so salty, but don't go and make posts blaming Obama for it again okay? lul

> My great other summoner(s) are, unfortunately for you, not banned either!

Mate you comment under tons of pb post how Riot sucks for permabanning you, are you trying to fool anyone here? ^^

Roleplaying fetish hm?

Btw you should look up what a personal attack is, because saying that you rant about bans on the pb board is definitly not what it means. If you feel your ban is unjustified then feel free to open a discussion yourself with unedited chat logs, so we can all make sure that you are innocent :)

> [{quoted}](name=Leylania,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uN5lqQMa,comment-id=0003000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-21T05:53:53.167+0000)
>
> Roleplaying fetish hm?
> 
> Btw you should look up what a personal attack is, because saying that you rant about bans on the pb board is definitly not what it means. If you feel your ban is unjustified then feel free to open a discussion yourself with unedited chat logs, so we can all make sure that you are innocent :)

It's satire at it's finest.

Obisidan knives (which prehistoric cave men used) were extremely sharp actually.  Probably sharper than knives we use today.

so I checked your 3 most recent games, all of them had about 10+ kills before 15 min....  awkward.
Sounds like someone keeps forgetting and diving people who have stopwatch.  {{champion:34}} #eggbaited
Tis not a sissier pick in all of Wraeclast than the fabled barrier stopwatch Anivia! I have long heard legends of man cards being revoked for invoking such a pick!
Sounds like a sample size of one player who was better than you.
Every single Lux and Orianna, the characters who already have unlimited fucking harass while using literally 0 mana and unlimited shields.
